name: Craft The World: Wonderwood
summary:
The "Wonderwood" DLC adds a new type of world to the game, featuring giant trees that disappear into the sky. The dwarves’ primary habitat—mountains and underground mines—is now far away, and their camp is located high up within the trunk of a massive tree. You'll have to adapt your habits and craft essential tools and weapons from various types of wood to defend against giant mosquitoes capable of draining an entire dwarf in one go. Additionally, temples belonging to the followers of a mysterious cult are scattered among the trees.

Features of the DLC:
- a new campaign level for experienced players
- numerous dangerous events in addition to monster waves
- underground colonies of cult followers
- new monsters, items, structures, and building blocks
